Text.Page: I'm here to help guildmasters choose an alliance. Don't worry, I'll put in a good word for yours.

I'm sure you've done your research on the material desires of the Free Traders Collective, the fellowship of the Enlightened Union, and the battle stance of the Iron Order. So which alliance do you want to join?
You need to be a guildmaster to join an alliance.
If the federation hadn't kept things from its people, the people wouldn't move to keep power fromthe federation!
